title: "Waiting for stats" - WHY on earth does it take so long now?
body:
After every game now, I see "Waiting for stats". And sometimes it takes around 2 minutes to bring up the post-game lobby.
Why is it so slow now?
I used to only see "waiting for stats" occasionally when my Internet was being slow...

replies.body:
It is definitely broken.... It only sometimes appears for me, and when it does it takes a good minute - 2 minutes to load up. I also know it's not just me because I'll get into the stats and then 2-3 other people will enter the stats page after me.
This is becoming more and more common I think. I'm unsure why.

i literally have to relog just to be able to see the game and the rewards of it (lp) since everytime i press skip waiting for stats nothing changes on my client... (doesnt update game history, lp points etc...)

kind of rediculous this thing has been going on for as long as it has... to my memory ive been having the same problem for almost 3 months now...



maybe try postponing a few new champs and try fixing stuff like this first...
also the forums/website...
i swear forums are down most of the time same with the website when you go into the "help" section... nothing is ever up and working
